title: Peer Learning-Based Leadership Development Program for Midwifery Preceptors

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Managed by mid-level nursing administrators in healthcare institutions, focusing on strengthening leadership competencies immediately applicable to practical settings

learning_goals: Identify three or more practical challenges in preceptorship through peer learning activities and develop solution strategies
Improve decision-making in student supervision processes by over 80% through reflective practice techniques
Operate a structured feedback system with one or more peer preceptors in their department within three months of training completion
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
